body.name: Premium First Aid Kit Travel, Waterproof with Shoulder Straps for Easy Carry - Ideal for Home, Car, and On-The-Go Emergencies
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 58 mins
features: TRAVEL-READY: Compact and portable car first aid kit designed specifically for car travel, ensuring you're prepared for emergencies on the go.
HOME ESSENTIALS: Equally suited for home use, providing comprehensive first aid kit for Home supplies for handling common injuries and accidents within your household.
DURABLE AND WATERPROOF: Constructed with a robust EVA case, this first aid kit offers superior protection against impact and water damage, keeping your supplies safe and secure.
CONVENIENT CARRYING: Comes with adjustable shoulder straps, allowing you to effortlessly carry the medical kit during camping, outdoor adventures to ensure quick access to essential medical supplies.

COMPREHENSIVE SURVIVAL KIT: Packed with a range of essential items including burn gel, instant ice pack, eye wash, and sting relief wipes, as well as a variety of bandages and other necessary tools to address various injuries and emergencies.
body.description: CureIT is a brand that puts your safety and happiness above all else. You know how important it is to be prepared in case of an emergency. That’s why we have designed a premium first aid kit featuring different accessories that allow you to take care of minor wounds and keep yourself or others safe at least until specialized medical care arrives. This first aid kit home is a practical and easy way to make sure you are always ready in case of an emergency. What makes this product special? Our first aid kit comes wit shoulder straps, waterproof features everything you need to take care of superficial wounds, including burns, cuts, scratches, blisters, rashes, and many others. We have included in the home first aid kit not just a wide range of bandages but also various supplies (swabs, eye pads, emergency foil blanket), tools such as tweezers, scissors, and a whistle. Some features to keep in mind about our product: Complete 154pcs first aid kit; Waterproof case; EVA hard case design; Ideal for cars, homes, boats, schools, offices; Lightweight and compact; Easy to store and carry; Great for outdoor hiking and camping; Suitable in case of emergencies; Smooth surface; Easy to clean; Practical and intuitive accessories. Keep yourself and your family safe with the help of our practical first aid kit!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All was described and expected.
reviews.reviewText: All came and was as described and was as I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Contains the basics
reviews.reviewText: Bought the kit to have in m vehicle for the "what if" situations. I have no idea if it contains everything I might need until those situations arise. Only item I can think I might need separate is a quality tourniquet. Hopefully will never need more than a bandaid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little first aid kit!
reviews.reviewText: Best little first aid kit for home, small office or car! The only thing is I would aspirin or Tylenol other than that it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for office or car
reviews.reviewText: Nice and compact first aid kit for the office or automobile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: This first aid kit is fully equipped with all the necessary materials to keep in your car. However, it has a strong smell that I cannot explain. I have never experienced this issue before when purchasing similar items from CVS. Despite the smell, the kit is still a reliable option for emergency situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing, includes everything you will ever need when there is an emergency and your away from home.
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing kit that every person should have for themselves. It includes everything needed when going away from home. There is everything needed for a vacation especially for hikes. I am so happy I bought it and plan on leaving it in my car for all my outings.
